Spotify to buy ad tech firm Megaphone to monetize podcasts

https://pageone.ng/2020/11/10/spotify-to-buy-ad-tech-firm-megaphone-to-monetize-podcasts/

$AAPL $SPOT

links.title: Spotify to buy ad tech firm Megaphone to monetize podcasts | PageOne
links.description: (Reuters) - Sweden-based Spotify Technology SA SPOT.N has agreed to buy podcast advertising and publishing platform Megaphone, it said on Tuesday, the latest in a series of a deals to boost its podcast platform. The deal is worth $235 million, a Spotify spokesman said.

links.title: Spotify To Acquire Podcast Hosting Company Megaphone For $235M
links.description: Spotify Technology (NYSE: SPOT) shares were trading lower Tuesday after the company announced it will acquire Megaphone for $235 million. In recent years, Spotify has beefed up its podcast streaming library. Earlier this year, Joe Rogan announced he would take his popular "Joe Rogan Experience" podcast exclusively to Spotify starting Sept.

messages.body: $CRSP $SPOT $TSLA 🤲💎💯
Spotify Announces Strategic Acquisition of Podcast Technology Leader, Megaphone http://www.conferencecalltranscripts.org/summary/?id=91231&pr=true $SPOT

links.title: Conference Call Transcripts
links.description: Get notified next time SPOT.US makes a similar move! NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Spotify Technology S.A. (NYSE:SPOT), the world's most popular audio streaming subscription service, today announced that the company has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Megaphone, one of the world's most innovative podcast advertising and publishing platforms. Together, Spotify and Megaphone will help advertisers and podcast publishers realize the full potential of podcasts.
